name: Shana Flury
text: I have been coming to this salon every 2-3 weeks for about a year. Most of the staff do an excellent job and the salon is very nice. But today, I came in for some services that I was prepared to spend a good chunk of change on, estimating I'd be there 2 or 2.5 hours. I was seated in a chair with my selected polish color, and then was not acknowledged any further. I sat for 45 mins with no one coming over to begin soaking off my nails, taking me back for my wax or anything that I normally experience even when the salon is extremely busy (it was not very busy today at all). I watched a couple more people come in behind me and have their services begun, so I left. I wasted the only time I had this weekend to have my nails done sitting in a chair and being ignored.

name: Caity Lovey
text: Found this hidden gym today and I’m so glad I did!! $30 for a Full set is a hard price to find now so I wasnt expecting anything too fancy. Boy was I wrong. The salon was absolutely beautiful inside and the complimentary wine made the experience even more enjoyable. THI did an amazing job on my nails. I received so many compliments. This is the best salon I’ve went to in Birmingham yet!! They even topped my usual spot. I give the location, the manicurist skills and the price all 5 stars! Will definitely be back (:

resp.text: Thank you for review

name: Monique B
text: Awesome and beautiful service. I’ve been coming here for 5 years and they never fail me!! Forever a customer!!!!

name: Mary French
text: Have been patronizing this spa for over 3 year along with my daughter. Technicians have become very rude and impatient. If I get a manicure and pedicure they insist on doing both at same time. Very uncomfortable and hazardous. Not a relaxed spa experience. More rushed and low quality results. Male and female technicians get attitude if you aren’t satisfied with obvious flaws in work. They just get up from station and mumble something. Then another technician appears without explanation. To management: I think you are taking your customers for granted. Leadership starts at the top. Check yourself and your techs too.

name: Du học và tìm việc tại Mỹ
text: Great place for pedicure and manicure. Beautiful inside. Staffs are nice and friendly. Also, good for kids and birthday celebration.

text: I drive 25 miles to get pampered by them, I absolutely love this place🙌🙌

resp.text: Thank you so much

name: Emily Gordon
text: Perfect for a treat yourself day. Very relaxing environment with water features and music. I had SNS done and it looks great, they even did a hand, arm and shoulder massage. It is pricey but very worth it for the occasional treat.

name: MM Entertaiment
text: This is my favorite place. Their service is awesome. The staffs are nice and friendly. Their kid pedicure chairs are so cute.

text: I'm in from out of town and I just wanted a relaxing environment and a mini spa day and that's exactly what I got! They set me up to have my pedicure and manicure done at the same time, it made me feel like a queen. they rubbed my feet and arms. they did a fantastic job and I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Lele mc
text: David did a great job! I hadn't been in over a month, and he took a lot of time getting my feet pretty again. Great location and great value. Clean and modern inside. They also have a section for little girls with Tinkerbell and  Disney princesses on chairs and a mural behind them - adorable! I wish my daughter was still little enough to enjoy that!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review.

text: Amazing customer service!! Wonderful staff and great services and products! My husband got me a package for my birthday here, and I am hooked. I had not been able to locate a nail salon comparable to the one in Nashville I used to go to. But now that I have been here, I have found my new nail salon!

resp.text: Thank you for your reviews.

name: Elizabeth B
text: My favorite place in the state of Alabama! Highly recommend. Beautiful atmosphere, very relaxing, technicians are all nice. Brian is my go-to person. He takes his time, does a great massage. One of my favorite attributes of this nail salon is their menu that allows for options on your mani or pedi.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and review.

name: Corinthean Mitchell
text: This is the 1st place that I found in Birmingham that does liquid gel nails. The hostess was very friendly but my nail tech can use some more practice.  My nails were uneven and lumpy.  The atmosphere was nice though.  I found a place that does better work.

name: Cheslyn Wilson
text: Amazing

name: Marissa Dodd
text: The absolute best salon I’ve ever been to and I don’t even live here. We live 10 hours away and I would drive here in a heartbeat to get this kind of quality and service.

name: Luan Brashaw
text: Love this place bc they always have time for you. Little or no wait & they really do an excellent job with pedicures.

name: Jasmine Christion
text: The pedicure was amazing and the tech Toni made sure I understood pricing before she begin, she was great. I also liked the diversity in the shop, however the nail tech... do not let them recommend services that they have performed else where and state that mid way in offering the service when she cannot get the powder colors correct. Then goes on to tell you that "oh, the picture I showed you I didn't do that here and this shop doesn't have all the color powders".... Oh is the right! But somewhere she also forgot to mention that the price increase by $25 and thought it was a good time to tell me when she ask for my payment! I'm not pleased with the way my nails turned out and for sure won't be back to this shop because the owner husband didn't do anything to justify his employer mistake

name: Heather Roth
text:
I have went the other day because it had 4 star reviews. Well it should be 1 star instead of 4! The workers are not professional and talk to you like you are from a different planet. Mind you that90% of the workers do not speak English and need translation every time you ask a question.
They over charged me and went back to adjust it and they started adding services I have not gotten done. At the end they told me they even gave me a discount!!!

name: Emily Brooks
text:
Cleanest place I've ever been to. The staff was friendly and professional. LONGEST PEDICURE EVER. This is a good thing, the actually spent time rubbing my legs and feet, calus removal, painting etc. I did the $35 pedicure.

They also did great with the kids! Have awesome little kid spa chairs.

name: Kensley Hubbard
text: This place is so nice and the lady Lily who did my gel manicure was so nice, friendly and polite. I didn't catch the mans name that did my pedicure but he was very pleasant as well. They have an awesome atmosphere and great customer service.

name: Jennifer Kao
text: I asked for a glass of wine, and the lady brought the wine in a dirty glass. I could see the lip gloss stains from the previous person that drank from the glass. I asked her to clean it so she “cleaned” it. When she brought the wine back, the stains were just smeared even more. I was disgusted. My pedicure was sub par. She missed painting the sides of my big toe. She refused to scrub my left foot after only scrubbing it for one minute. Very poor place, do not go here.

name: Laniece Wright
text: Love, love love this place!! They should  change the name to royalty nails & spa! It looks like royalty upon arrival. Everyone was polite. They also have an area  for the little girls to get pampered!  Just awesome!

name: Sarah Wilson
text: I've given this nail salon a lot of chances. The most recent experience, while not unpleasant, left me feeling really disappointed when I got home and looked at my nails: the gel bubbled, it wasn't dry and the polish was sloppily done and rushed. This has happened before and I had to go back to have it redone. I thought I would try again, but nope...still not satisfied. Not to mention $40 for a gel manicure, a bad one at that, is not reasonable!

resp.text: Thank you Sarah for taking the time to leave a review. I'am Sorry you didn't have a good

name: Teverlyn Allen
text: This is the cleanest place I've ever had mani pedicures done. Such lovely decor and atmosphere. Utilizes aggressive infection control techniques that gives a sense of security that used equipment is not being used between customers. I have experienced long massages during pedicures depending on who performs the service or which service is selected. They also offer other services like lash extensions. This is the only place I will go for these services because they do such a great job. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Allen !Thanks for choosing S Nails & Spa ,very love see you.

text: I’ve been here a few times, and usually I get great service even when the place is super busy. They’re very reasonably priced, and they’re always my go-to nail salon in Birmingham. But I have to say, the guy that seems like he runs the place is a bit rude and abrasive. He was very rough with my nails.

resp.text: I'm so sorry.Please give me a chance to make you happy.Thank you let me know.

name: Megan De
text: I think overall the shop is extremely nice and friendly. They are a bit overpriced on pedicures for what they provide. It was less intensive on the feet than much less expensive places. They did have a large variety of options and a wonderful area that catered to kids but I don't imagine I'll be returning any time soon, I'd much rather explore some other places.

text: Nice nail salon feels upscale with out and upscale price! I love getting pedis and this place gives a good one!

text: Location is great, building and decor were beautiful, ambiance and availability were perfect, pedicure chair was amazing, awesome pedicure and staff (especially Dali) were superb! 100% would recommend to anyone and everyone. Cannot wait to return. Thank you S Nails & Spa (especially the wonderful Dali!)!

name: Jacqueline Dorris
text: I came here for the first time on Friday, before a trip to the beach. I had an hour set aside for a pedicure and was pleased with the amount of time they spent on it and the quality of it. At  the 55 minute mark, I was drying my toe nail polish and ready to go.  The gentlemen didn't speak great English but was very friendly and tried his best to interact.

resp.text: Thanks for review.

name: Christy Culotta
text: Took my 11 year old daughter here to try a set of acrylic nails for her amazing grades. We were immediately pressured into trying and which since I was treating the both of couldn't imagine paying. So once we chose acrylic the terrible rude experience began.  The owner started on me he never smiled and only talked to be rude. He then got up and left me there waiting and a older man returned and began. During the session one man giggled asking my 11 yr old daughter if she was "high" from the fumes. All I can say is based on my extremely uneven nails and rude and strange behavior maybe the are "high"! We will not be back and advise others to chose some place better.

resp.text: We are sorry

text: I just left the salon that I sat for 20 minutes in a chair with no water waiting on a pedicure while four other people came in and received service before me. I put my socks and shoes on, gathered  my things and no one said a word as I walked out.

text: I am very nervous about who does my eyebrows and moving to Birmingham I have been looking for the right place to get them done. I went to S nails based on previous reviews and I was not disappointed. The place is gorgeous and the lady that did my eyebrows was very nice and knows what she is doing. She told me to come back again in 3 weeks to allow them to grow out some more, so I did. 3 weeks and a second appointment later they are looking better than they ever have. I will be going back for a manicure and pedicure soon.

name: jersey girl
text:
Save your money and spend it somewhere else!!! I have spent $120 getting mine and my daughters nails done. I requested a ombré from the beginning nd showed a picture. After he was done and about to paint them, he told me what color I needed? I told him I wanted the ombré and he said he can’t do it because it was too late since he already filed them and cleaned them and ombré won’t work.?????  Okay I was fine and chose a different color. While getting my nails painted the guy accidentally bumped into my nails while they were wet and messed it up. He blamed me and told me don’t move. How rude right ?
After he painted over it making a 3rd layer( which he is not suppose to) my nail polish started cracking and I called him back to fix it. He gave me the dirtiest look ever! Anyway! I have patiently waited for 15 mins for my nails to dry and paid and left.
An hour later all my nails started bubbling , cracking, & by the next day they were faiding away like I have gotten my nails done a month ago.
I went back and showed them my nails to get them fixed, the manager started talking in a different language to workers and both blamed me for my nails and said I didn’t wait to dry my nails and it was MY fault. Ended up paying another $25 dollars to fix them and now today is the 2nd day and I have 2 nails broken and my nails are still faiding away!
I never write reviews but I had to for this place! Worst place ever!

text: Stay away from this place! I went in for a manicure/pedi with my two young daughters and paid $200+! The technician cut off ALL of my cuticles on my fingers and painted over them, so it looked sloppy. That wasn't the worst part though - I ended up getting a bacterial infection on my thumb and had to go through two rounds of antibiotics and part of the nail has fallen off, which has been very painful. I continue to battle with this 5 months later. The owner at my trusted salon at home said that they probably didn't sterilize their instruments and that the technician should have NEVER cut off my cuticles. Save the headache and medical bills and go elsewhere!

I never have any issues with quality and or hygene. They are a few dollars more than some other places, but I'll protect my health over a few bucks anyday.

text: Growing younger is such a great medi spa! The atmosphere when I walk in is great and the staff is so nice and helpful. They have the best prices around and offer a wide variety of services. Definitely recommend!

name: Rachel Abernathy
text:
This place is amazing. Always clean and smells good. Staff is extra sweet, usually do not have to wait long, they have free coffee and water. Very nicely decorated. My sister and I travel together over two hours to go there. They always remember our names no matter how long it’s been since we have been there. The doctor is very nice and professional. My sister has had fillers and she looks 10 years younger. I have had laser treatment on my inner thighs and love handles and it really made a difference. We both get weight loss medication, adipex. It WORKS!! I can’t say enough good things about them.
You should come try them yourself!! :):):)

name: brian witty
text: Great Doctor and Staff.  They listen to your needs and help you find the right program for you.  They are also very reasonable on their prices.

text: This place is the worst I had my laser treatment and did not get a result the also burnt my hand and the satisfaction for me was horrible if there were neagitive star I would give many negative stars never go to this place you will not be satisfied and when I went to get my money back the reaseptionist guy was very rude D NOT GO TO THIS PlACE ever!!!!!!!!!!

name: Amanda Valdez
text:
Amazing group of professionals! They are up to date on the latest beauty trends while also taking the time to continue to educate themselves on the ever changing technology and skin care. Not only can you schedule a visit for cosmetic enhancements and maintenance to LOOK younger, their massage therapists and esthetician can pamper you and make you FEEL younger. Do you hate shaving? If you’re up for the challenge, go see Lydia for Laser hair removal! It’s worth every penny!

They offer great monthly deals to make sure everyone has an opportunity to look and feel their best!

The staff, environment, and affordability easily makes this the best Medical Spa in Madison/Huntsville!

name: Jesse Lyons Live
text: I could not have had a better experience at Growing Younger Clinic! I was treated like royalty from the moment I walked in the door. The facility is laid out well, the decor is tasteful and warm, and most importantly the place is very clean. I knew I was in good hands from the moment I walked up to the front desk. Their prices on procedures are incredible comparatively to other med spas. I had Miradry performed, and paid literally half of what all the spas and doctors offices in my area charge. Dr. Jamey performed my anesthesia and made sure I was comfortable and well numbed. Lydia was the technician who performed the procedure and she was thorough at explaining and was very warm and friendly. I also had cool sculpting done, and Emory checked on me multiple times throughout the procedure to make sure I was doing fine. World class staff!! I was blown away. I'll be back to get more work done. It's worth the 7.5 hour drive!

name: C
text:
I scheduled an appointment for a facial, a month ago. Called the day before about the possibility of canceling.  She told me if I canceled then there is a 25.00 fee. I decided that I will take off work and go. I get there at 9:45  was told they couldn't  find my name and it was canceled anyway. Front desk staff on the phone and in office was rude and knew nothing about the lady working the afternoon before.  Had to reschedule and the next appointment is a month away. Might just have to pass and go somewhere else.
Edit to add that Tonya called me immediately to squeeze me in the next day. I couldn't get out of work again soo .

name: Jose Maldonado
text: Great service

text: We love Growing Younger! So friendly and punctual and skillful! We get the best care at a fantastic price. Thank you for all your help with our beauty needs!

name: Brittany Dale
text: I have been going here for for laser hair removal and the results are great. The hair grows back much thinner and at a much slower rate. Even when the hair is somewhat visible, you can't feel it. It feels bare like baby skin. The staff are nice and I really like the woman that does my treatments.

text: Kiss them wrinkles goodbye.  At a good price.

text: I got 6 laser treatments in my bikini area and within 3 months my hair is back. It did NOTHING. I also got coolslimming and they said it takes 4 months to see results and it didn’t work AT ALL. I will not spend a dime there ever again.

text: Have been here for a massage twice now and they have both been great.

text: I went to get a microdermabrasion treatment there last week, mind you I have had several before but just moved to Huntsville and was hoping to find a place I could go and have one every few months... the woman who did mine was beyond RUDE ! She spoke maybe 5 words to me and I’ve never had such a harsh treatment the towels they use are not soft and she rubs your face like she’s scrubbing clothes! I will never return to this spa if you can call it that .. don’t expect anything nice if you go!! If I could rat them a 0 I would... AWFUL experience ! Go anywhere else but here!!!!!

name: Laura Gummel
text: Upscale facility, friendly staff and highly recommend. Will return for another massage.

name: MyLifeAsMycah
text: I've been going to Growing Younger for the last 7 months. I stumbled upon them on Groupon and took up an offer for laser hair removal. As an AA woman, I can attest that this place provides wonderful results. Amanda is my laser specialist and she is amazing. Definitely give them a try!

name: Christy Tallant
text: I absolutely love the services that I have received at Growing Younger. I am going on my second week of services with them. Since I have been going I have seen a dramatic change in my appearance. Their staff is well trained and is willing to answer any questions you have. I love the fact that when you walk into the building they welcome you with a smile and a hello. Darlicia always has a smile on her face. She is very knowledgeable and helpful during my procedures. I would recommend Growing Younger to all my friends.

name: Angela Drensek
text: I have been going to Growing Younger for just over a year now.  I have had Microderm Abrasions, Facials, skin tag removal, and laser hair removal.  My face texture is completely different than it was a year ago.  Their trained staff teaches you how to take care of your skin offering advice and wonderful products.  My makeup goes on better, and sometimes I don't even wear any makeup - the change has been that dramatic.  I have micros and facials once a month and have been doing so for the past year.  I have also undergone laser hair removal and after 6 appointments I have great results.  Being dark headed this is a life changing improvement.  I had my legs and underarms done - it is great not to have to shave.  I highly recommend Growing Younger.

name: Nilda Rivera
text: The staff  needs to ask more info on the phone prior to your appointment.  When you get there they tell you the doctors only there Thursday .

name: Kristin Barnett
text: I had a microdermabrasion facial. It was awesome. They had me in right on time and the girl was very nice and professional. My skin felt wonderful!!! I also had the B12 shots and was able to walk in and out with virtually no wait time.

name: Terri Thompson
text: Was badly burned by esthetician and received permanent damage during laser hair removal in 2015. No remedial action was taken on the clinic's part so I had to file complaints with BBB, Alabama Board of Cosmetology and because the owner is a chiropractor, had to file a complaint with the Alabama Board of Chiropractic Examiners. He was put on 5 years probation and fined several thousand dollars for unprofessional conduct and for performing services outside the scope of a chiropractic license--if the fine isn't paid by the deadline, his license will be suspended for that period of time. Do not recommend this clinic for laser services. None of my expenses (doctor, cosmetics, or even the botched laser service) were reimbursed by the clinic.

name: Ciearra Jackson
text: Enjoyed the staff and the service! Everyone was so friendly and efficient. The environment is so inviting. I didn't have just tremendous results with iLipo, but then again I did not increase my physical activity. However, the staff was great during the process, and I felt very informed about the procedure. I have a message waiting, and I can't wait to have some time away from work to use it. I definitely recommend Growing Younger to anyone in the Huntsville area.

name: Nyla Blakley
text:
Staff so friendly and reassuring. Everyone is so professional and I highly recommend.
Anything from weight loss, facial, massage, chiropractic and great advice on health products.

Tech talked me out of it, because of my skin condition. Opted for microdermabrasion.
She paid more attention to my forehead..didnt go near my folds around my nose.
Be prepared to fill out your medical life on paper, and then have them not look at it.
We did not do a full hour, which was the time that was suppose to be allotted.
As soon as the tech was tipped, she be lined to the employees office.
Certainly didnt feel very welcome or appreciated for my patronage.

name: Olivia Colvin
text:
I love this place! Think I stumbled upon this gem from Groupon originally. The staff is friendly, the place is impeccably clean every visit (I’ve been here about 6-7 times now.) Thus far I have only used their b-12 shots spartically for managing my anemia, but I love that I can get in and out every time, no appointment and longest I’ve ever waited was maaaybe five minutes! They offer unique monthly specials for a wide variety of services (massages, shots, facial treatments, non invasive body contouring) and never ever try to upsell me anything. I wish they offered more vitamin injection options, but that’s just me.

For the record, I am pretty sure that I have brought anywhere from one to three children with me at any given time and never once has the staff been rude or unwelcoming in the least (or maybe I just have that “Don’t even think about it” look down better than I thought!) I appreciate that as a mother I don’t get annoyed looks from the staff just for walking in the door.

Definitely looking forward to continuing my visits here for b12 and thinking about trying other treatments/services with this place in the future!

name: Amber Litteken
text: Everyone is very professional. Lazer hair removal is 100% worth it.

name: A. Zachery
text: I called to see if I could reschedule my appointment because I didn't want to be late, but I couldn't. The Groupon had already been redeemed by the business and there was a 24 hour cancellation policy. I understand the policy but why was my Groupon redeemed before services were rendered. When I finally got there through traffic, they said that I would only have 20 minutes for a massage.  I politely said ,"Thats okay, it's been a long week and my birthday is tomorrow. Dont worry about it."  So I left and I was a little hurt by the customer service I had received at this point and I went back in to ask if they were apart of the BBB, because at this point I saw where this was going.  The young lady at the front was really rude toward me and so was the man who is a massage therapists. I have scoliosis and I was looking for some relief for my birthday. I'm African American and I am just wondering if I wasn't, if it would've made a difference at all. I called to ask about the policy because I want to be treated fairly. The phone disconnected while I was asking and when I called back it went to voicemail. I called back from a different number and the phone was answered then it was passed to a man works there and he was even more rude than the young lady working at the front. I was in shock how fast he got annoyed with me and I wasn't being disrespectful at all. He then said that if I called back he would file harassment charges against me, then hung up me in my face. As a first time customer, I felt like I was treated really badly. I will not be going back to this business EVER AGAIN and I pray that justice is served for how I was treated.

name: Cassandra Henry
text: I have truly enjoyed Growing Younger for several services. I recommend Growing Younger to ALL my colleagues and friends.  Darlicia and Trista and just simply amazing. They made me feel so comfortable.  My husband comments every day that he notices the results of the ilipo ultra!!  I cannot express enough how much I value the experience I've had at Growing Younger.

name: Daphne Tabis
text: I visited Growing Younger a few times for i-Lipo treatments. I was very impressed by the friendly staff; they were professional, knowledgeable, and willing to answer all of my questions. I appreciated the appearance/ decor and cleanliness of the facilities. I look forward to future visits.

name: cecilia uselton
text: Trista is AWESOME!  I've had facial treatments at Growing Younger and it is a GREAT place to go.  Staff is nice and helpful.

name: Kaitlyn Gregg
text: I got the microdermabrasion. I found a Groupon and it was only $26 so I decided to give it a try. Overall, as this being my first facial I was not impressed and probably won't be back. A lady named Tonia did my facial. She wasn't knowledgeable about the products she was using. When I asked her questions, I got very blunt answers. After she cleansed my face, she dried it with what felt like a paper towel, and I don't know about y'all but a paper towel being scraped across your face after you just had a "vacuum" scrape it, is not comfortable. The microdermabrasion part itself was fine. But the before and after how she cleansed and dried my face was not ideal. I feel like they used very low quality moisturizers and lotions. I was surprised they didn't use any serums.

name: Jennifer Chesser
text: I have recieved B12 shots at Growing Younger and I couldn't be happier.  I have noticed I have been more energized.  The staff is wonderful and friendly.  I definitely recommend Growing Younger.

text: Ashley is awesome. She microbladed my brows today & they look amazing!!

text: I had some I lipo treatments done there and every time I went the staff was friendly and beyond helpful! Growing younger is always up to date with the lastest treatments, etc and the facilities are always well maintained! I know they always have amazing promotions going on and I definitely will be back to try some of their other services!

name: Alicia Chambers
text: Growing younger has become my favorite place to visit. I've received peels, microdermabrasion, and B12 shots. The staff is so friendly, they make you feel so welcome. Trista is my favorite! I would highly recommend their services. They've also worked me in the on the day I called for a treatment. I return as often as I can. Great monthly specials and groupons as well.

name: Pamela Beckwith
text: Very pleased with service and the professionalism and kindness the staff offers.

name: Amber Harwell
text: I have received Botox plenty of times. My first experience with Growing Younger was a month ago and I received what they recommended I needed which was twice as much as I normally got at my other doctor. After a month I noticed that it was already wearing off. So I go back in and Dr. Wagner seemed very frustrated and stormed off and came back with Botox to fix the problem. I have never felt such pain while receiving Botox and hours later I still have a terrible headache. I’m pretty sure he took his frustration out on my forehead! Not only did I think their Botox was deluted but they also overcharged me $111.00. They charged me for 10 extra units that I never recieved. When I mentioned my refund they wanted to do a “store credit”. After refusing the store credit Dr. Wagner said “Well what do you want??” I replied my money back on my card! He refunded my money and I nicely said thank you. He replied yep and I walked out. Such a rude and awkward visit! I can’t believe he actually thought I would want to return back to use my $111 of store credit after he acted the way he did.

name: Tim Jordan
text:
Unprofessional treatment, they are nice till they get your money then treat unprofessional.
personal experience without going into much detail, but i would not recommend them to anyone

name: GiGi
text: Really friendly staff & their Groupons make it affordable for me!

name: Jennifer McCoy
text: The staff at the Growing Younger office was great. The specials that are offered are great!

name: Debra Mears
text: Went in because I noticed the Botox walk in Thursday flags and was about to leave in a couple weeks for my 60th Birthday trip. I got Botox and Juvederm done on my face. I would NEVER go back there or recommend them for either treatment. I had to go back a week later because the side of my mouth was caving in and they added more Juvederm. They said they had used a full syringe on me which I don't believe because the last place I had it done only used a half with better results! The BIG problem is  they said they used 40 units of Botox which last time I only got 20, they did not ask how many units I wanted! My eyes are practically closed and I can't open them. You can't see my eyelids at all and I can't raise my eyes up. Instead of looking better for my trip I looked awful with my nearly closed eyes. Everyone that knows me asked what did you do to your eyes??? Thank GOD Botox does not last to long and I'm praying this is a temporary result that will go back to normal. I thought they would be cheaper but they were the same price as my plastic surgeon only faster to walk in. I will wait to get an appointment with a professional surgeon next time. Not worth messing with my vision!

resp.text:
Hi, Ms. Debra. We apologize for the experience you received that day as we were closed the entire week for Thanksgiving.
I am the only one that works there along with my office assistant. We both do not recall seeing you, maam, and if we did, we surely would have greeted you at the door. Now, sometimes one of our children would be up front once in awhile to grab something for us from the desk and as we have always told them not to open doors for strangers, it possibly could've been one of them. So, as I only work as appointment only, my door remains locked at all times. Again, Ms. Debra, we apologize for your experience.

For future reference, we will be closing our doors Jan. 15th as I will be moving to Vestavia and Odenville. You may visit my website or facebook for all info if you wish to receive any service from me in the future, maam.

Thank you, Ms. Debra.

www.lemilabeauty.com

name: Alyssa Hansen
text: While I would love to rate this 5 stars for the absolutely spectacular massages my wife and I received, we got slapped with some fees that weren’t explained to us or shown at the time of booking. What we thought would be $150 experience put us double that in the hole. The website states an intro massage is $60 and a hot stone $80, so we booked one of each and asked if we could be in the same room (as in a couples massage). Had the most relaxing, soothing experience from beginning to end. But unknown to us, there’s a separate charge for a couples massage. It was never stated during booking, during check in, or during check out. And unfortunately I was so relaxed as we paid, I didn’t think to ask the total, nor was the total given to me. Just took my card, swiped, and we left. Didn’t realize the extra charge was there til checking our statement today. Called and THEN for the 1st time we heard about the couples massage fee. And now it’s too late. It’s a shame because Tai gave the best massage I’ve ever had, but I won’t be back due to irresponsible charging.

resp.text: Hi, thank you for reaching out with your honest concerns. We are disappointed to hear about your recent experience. If you are willing, please call or email us directly at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com so we can discuss how we can begin to make this better. We value your business and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Elena Sierakowski
text: I went here for my birthday and it was my first time visiting. I had Nick and he was amazing!! He started our session off by asking questions so he’d know how to best help fix me. I’ve had a lot of built up stress from work and kids and he did a wonderful job of getting out most of my knots and getting rid of my headache. It was a really great experience and I absolutely plan on coming back!

name: Marlena Kenney
text: Ty is the absolute best! She addressed my areas of concern and I felt 100% better. I will be returning for her professionalism & expertise. Thanks Ty! 😁

resp.text: Hi Marlena, thanks for highlighting our staff in your positive review! If there is ever anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to reach out.

name: Jessica Brown
text:
I had my first prenatal massage with Tara and let me just say, WONDERFUL! I went in with some tension in my shoulders and upper back (pregnancy during a pandemic can be stressful 🤣) so I called prior to my appointment to ask if the prenatal massage could be customized and if I could have more of a focus in that  area rather than in my lower back that typically accompanies pregnancy. Of course, the ladies up front that answered my call were incredibly friendly and went out of their way to check with the therapist instead of just placating me with some generic answer. They were also very friendly and professional when I arrived.
Once it came time for my massage, Tara explained everything first and made me feel completely at ease and comfortable. I did add on the Lavender aromatherapy and wondered if it would be worth it or not due to wearing a mask. It. Was. Worth. It. Just do it. You won’t regret it. The massage itself was excellent and met all of my standards. There was a time or two that I almost felt like asking her to move on to a different area because the pressure was beginning to be too much for me (it was a good hurt, don’t worry, I’m just a wimp), but it was almost as if she was so in tuned with me that she moved on before I got to that point. At checkout, they were offering  a wellness package, and while I passed on it due to the fact that I’ll be having a baby soon and won’t have the availability for a while, it is definitely something I’ll consider in the future. If you want to ensure you’ll make time for a monthly massage or facial, get it! It’s time to treat yourself!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your positive experience, Jessica! We are happy to hear you are feeling relaxed and rejuvenated after your appointment at Hand & Stone Huntsville! We look forward to your next visit.

text:
Kim did my facial/waxing and it was amazing. She was open and let me know I could speak up of I didn't like something
It was like being with a long time friend. I was so incredibly relaxed after. I will be coming back. The front desk staff was so nice as well.

text:
Pros: Clean facility, you can book online to suit your schedule, decent price

Cons: While you can book online, they constantly call to ask you to change your appt to what suits them better. When I first went in, I was convinced to sign up, with a selling point that family members got the same rate as the member. I started booking for my Husband. They then told me it was only once every six months a guest could come in. So we signed him up. We have each had several massages there. Only one each has been great (Vielka and Shirley). The great massage therapists book far in advance which leaves you with subpar at best to choose from. It’s been disappointing.

text: Very happy with my experience here! The entire staff was welcoming and accommodating as soon as I walked in the door. The waiting area was beautiful, tranquil and clean. I chose to get a 1 hour deep tissue massage which was incredible. The massage therapist was very attentive and she did a wonderful job listening to me and ensuring the pressure was just right. I would highly recommend this place to anyone and everyone looking for a truly relaxing experience. I will be back!

name: Ashley Kelly
text: Very nice and clean place.  Staff was extremely nice and accommodating.  My masseuse was good, but I will ask for someone different next time.  There was an area in the shoulders that she seemed to want to REALLY work out (however, I think it was part of my natural anatomy maybe because it never budged and it was present on both sides), and she pressed so hard for so long that it became uncomfortable and hurt, so I had to ask her to stop (let me clarify, I'm not a wimp, I can take pain). She moved on to the other areas in my back, legs, and feet which felt really good, but she had spent so much time on the shoulder area, that I felt those areas did not get as much attention as they needed. I will give it 4 stars because I did not encounter an unfriendly person the entire time I was there, and it was extremely clean and tranquil.  I will give the masseuse 3 stars.  I will go back.  I would like to give their other services a try as well.

name: Daniel Johnson
text: An absolutely wonderful experience!  Very professional staff who is amazing at their profession.   I will definitely get another appointment!

name: kelli jones
text: Always professional especially during covid everything is clean, staff is friendly they do temp. Checks and everyone wears a mask, and the message is very relaxing and they pay attention to your issues you need wrking on wear you carry more stress, I ve been going to Daniel for a yr hes the best massage therapist

name: Lindsey Goldensoph
text: I had Matthew for a massage today. Not only was he very kind but he also was very skilled and did an amazing job. The front desk associates were incredibly welcoming and sweet. I am very impressed and will only be going to Hand & Stone from now on! The introductory cost is incredibly low for the quality of an experience you get in return. I would recommend this establishment to everyone I know!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your service at Hand & Stone Huntsville! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!

name: Amanda Goeke
text:
Hand and stone is doing an excellent job in this time of Covid. I feel safe every time I go in, as they are only allowing individuals who have appointments, and our temperature was checked upon arrival.

I have had a couple of the therapists, and they have all been wonderful. I highly recommend

name: Patrick Bolton
text: Very great people there! They remember my name and the massages are great!

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out. We would like to apologize for the frustration you experienced while trying to reach us. If you are willing to give us another chance, please contact the spa at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com at your earliest convenience so we can answer any lingering questions you may still have. We look forward to hearing from you. Have a great day!

name: Britania
text: Everyone was so attentive to the clients needs.

name: Matthew Pickens
text: I've had three sessions with Hand and Stone so far, and each one has been exemplary. The greeting/checkout staff are marvelously helpful and always cheerful; they provide a welcoming, relaxing vibe from walking in to walking out. I've been having deep-tissue massages with Ronnie S., and I cannot recommend him highly enough. His technique is masterful, and he is always highly communicative about what he is doing, why he is doing it, and with frequent checks to make sure the pressure he's applying is appropriate. Already looking forward to my next appointment!

name: Perry Taylor
text: Good concept .   Yet the level of service is inconsistent and pricy for the level received.

resp.text: Hello Perry, we appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your recent experience with us. Our staff is trained to provide each of our guests with the highest caliber of customer service and professionalism, so we are concerned to learn about your visit. Please reach out to us directly at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com so we can discuss your experience further. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Anilee Bailey
text: I went in for a prenatal massage. First, it was extremely clean and relaxing. Second, everyone there was incredibly nice. Third, the massage was amazing. I'm totally going back

name: Kesha Jones
text: My very first time coming here. Soon as I walked inside the ladies at the desk made me feel welcomed as they greeted me with a smile. I checked in and they gave me a form to fill out. As I was filling out the form one lady offered me water (mango water) and I said yes and she fixed it for me. About 5min later another young lady came over and told me where the restrooms where and explained to me how I can change the settings of the fan in the massage room and also the heating temperature on the bed... absolutely amazing customer service, very friendly staff, very relaxing and clean atmosphere. The Deep Tissue massage, Valindsia did a phenomenal job... I've had plenty massages at other places but this one was by far the best!!!! I left feeling like a brand new person, can't wait til my next appointment next month😁

name: Schinell Walker
text: First i must say i love this place,it  is clean and the staff is friendly i went in for a 3pm appointment and had MONICA doing my microdermabrasion facial she was AWESOME💯💯💯 as the process went by she gave me info on all the products she was using and what they were for i was so relaxed i almost fell asleep. I love her  and i highly recommend this place.

name: The Smith Adventures
text: My husband does their monthly package and we travel a lot so we have a chance to check out multiple Hand and Stone location. The staff at this location was very friendly and helpful. We both had a massage and I had a facial. Both of us were happy with our massages and I was happy with my facial. We live about 3m5 hours away but will be back again and make it a little mini getaway. Also be aware parking can be a bit tough at meal times as there are a lot of restaurants close.

name: Joëline Mpabwa
text: Katy was amazing!! My first time coming here and they made me feel welcomed. Katt was so on point with all my knots area and took special time to advise me on what I should do to help me with releasing the knots on my own time. I felt very comfortable and relaxed. Will definitely book again. I strongly recommend this place👍🏾

With dressing, and walking out etc. I would say she prob got 40 min, paid for 60. Aside from that ... People were nice, clean facility, relaxing environment, experienced MT.

They were all very professional however, my last visit was with Tangela.... and she was phenomenal!!! Her knowledge base was evident in her skills. She took the time before starting  to determine what was needed to benefit me most during my session by asking questions and listening. Thank you Tangela. It was a pleasure being your client! Although I am choosing  to find a facility closer to my home,I am sure I will visit again in the future.

name: Genea Flowers
text: I love Hand & Stone, everyone is always so nice and welcoming.  I especially love my massage therapist Terra she is top notch!

name: Allen Lastinger
text: The Hand and Stone do a fabulous job of making you feel welcome and comfortable. The wait is  short when you make an appointment. The facility is very clean and modern and the staff are friendly. The massage therapist was great and attentive to my needs. I will be back soon!

name: Kathleen Hair
text: Nice, quiet and relaxing. Gave 4 stars due to a billing issue that yet has been resolved.

name: Shannon Creel
text: My wife enjoyed the place I got it for her birthday

name: Nichole Collins
text: I was so excited when I heard this place was opening. When I finally decided to come in, I was not disappointed! The front desk is very welcoming and knowledgeable, they answered all of my questions. The lobby is very homey and relaxing. I absolutely loved my massage! If you go, I recommend the Himalayan salt stones!

name: Amanda Simon
text: Love at first visit! The front desk ladies are so warm and welcoming. For me it feels like a visit with friends. My massage therapist is AMAZING! He helps me be my best self. By helping me relax, I can continue to be a great wife and mother to my little girls.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your service at AL Huntsville! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!

text: I enjoy the facials at Hand and Stone and the variety of products/services they offer.  The only thing I do miss is the hand/arm/neck massage that was included at my previous Spa while the mask was working its magic! It may be that these are add-on options but I have not been made aware of them.

resp.text: It is always a pleasure to see you again! Thanks for the wonderful review and valuable feedback! We can't wait for your next visit!

name: Jasmine Spruill-Young
text:
I received a gift certificate to Hand and Stone. From booking online and choosing my massage therapist to the wonderful service received from Anthony to the actual massage, my experience at Hand and Stone was great. They have a wonderful ambiance when entering and great staff.

The massage therapist, Cat, read my intake form and listened when I discussed my problem areas. She provided me with tips when I'm between massages. Thanks so much for a great experience.

name: Anna Rosado
text: This was my first experience getting a professional massage and it was absolutely incredible!! Super kind and friendly staff, warm and serene rooms and very clean. I got the hot stone massage with Vielka and she did an outstanding job getting the knots out of my back and completely relaxed me. This place will be a regular part of my self-care routine!

name: Prinal Patel
text: Absolutely loved my visit to Hand & Stone! The front desk staff was super friendly. My massage was with Tangela, who was superb. I upgrade to an 80 minute Himalayan salt stone massage with her. I will never go back to a regular massage or a different therapist. The whole experience was fabulous!

name: Tasha Vineyard
text:
If I can I will Always add the scalp massage. Super soothing and relaxing. The whole experience was great and I'll definitely go back.

Editing my review to add that as a member I am never able to schedule a convenient appointment time online and that the staff turnover has not allowed me to schedule with the same massage therapist twice. I was charged for an appointment I wasn't at even though I called the day before to cancel. I spoke with someone earlier this week to cancel my membership and she said she would have the manager call me back when she came in , in a "little bit" that phone call was never returned . I get physician prescribed massages for anxiety  and since joining I've only been able to utilize my membership twice. I started out going to Journey in Madison but this was closer to my home, however after this experience I will be making the extra drive.

name: Christie Moore
text: Tangela was phenomenal!  This was my first massage and my oh my.  I was thrilled to find out that there was a membership that included monthly visits.  The staff was A+ from the moment I stepped through the door.  Can't wait for my next visit!!

name: Dakota Dunn
text: My experience was great! The place was very clean and the people were also so nice. If you want a massage I highly recommend Valindsia she done an amazing job for me!!!

name: Adiana Cox
text: Fantastic establishment!  The environment is beautiful!, Clean, and comfortable!  The ladies are warm and friendly, and totally professional.  My first appointment was handled professionally and I was/am very happy with the result of my waxing.  I will return.

text:
It was my first session although my wife goes here several times a week - she loves it. My masseur used the "Firm" setting and I gotta tell you it was great. My lower back had chronic pain and after my massage it is completely gone.

Very professional and relaxing atmosphere, effective massage - what more can you ask for ? I will be going back there.

name: Riley Couch
text: Amazing environment. As soon as I walked in I was greeted by Anthony and Sherie who welcomed me with smiles and kind words and answered all questions I had. Daniel did my massage and he had the hands of an Angel! Ended up buying a membership because it was that AWESOME! Best place in town!

name: Jessica Geisen
text: My experience was amazing from the moment I stepped in the doors! Every staff member was so courteous and knowledgeable and my session was completely tailored to my needs. Terra was absolutely amazing and I can’t wait to see her again in 2 weeks. I HIGHLY recc Hand and Stone Huntsville!

name: Kendria Jones
text: My husband and I had a wonderful experience. The couples massage is amazing. The therapist worked out kinks that I didn’t know I had. Truly enjoyed it.

name: Jennifer Gallagher
text: I had an amazing massage by Vielka. I would totally recommend her to anyone looking to book here. The spa is nice and conforms with all the other hand stone massage spa in the US. Super friendly staff as well! I will definitely be booking again in the future.

name: Ann Creager
text: Wonderful experience. Staff was so friendly and helpful. Daniel was great. I would recommend going to everyone!!

name: Tamyra Sampson
text: Great massage and servicd

name: Amber Young
text: Overall it was relaxing. I felt like the massage was more rubbing than massaging. As a runner I like massages to dig into all the overused muscles. Also, I paid extra for a peppermint scalp massage ($15). Although it felt good, it lasted for about 1 minute and my massage ended early. I arrived at 11:57 for my 12 o'clock appointment. I went back to the room around 12:10 for my 1 hour massage and additional scalp massage and i was released at 12:58. I feel like if you are going to pay for an extra service that should not take away from the original service you paid for. Pay more, get less does not seem like a good way to handle clients.

name: Suzanne Franco
text: Massage was great!!  Room was relaxing! Highly recommended

name: Heather Hamilton
text: The massage was good; however the add on of the cold stone face massage was a disappointment.  The initial towel was lukewarm instead of hot and the stones that are supposed to be placed under my eyes kept falling off.  It definitely was not worth the extra $15. I mentioned my disappointment to the masseuse and receptionist.

name: Bree Welch
text: Hand and Stone will forever be a part of my self care routine. Lovely staff, relaxing atmosphere, and very knowledgeable on all their practices, if you are curious I highly suggest just booking one appointment and your mind will be made up. Also they offer prenatal massages!

text: Very nice staff, good quality of service and very easy to communicate in this quiet and serene environment. The waiting line was not too long and when you go for the first time you get a nice little discount. The fact that there were people waiting for this salon shows that it is well known by the locals to be a salon worth your time. I highly recommend this place!

name: Ramblin Rose
text: Made an appointment, arrived 10 minutes early. After waiting 20 minutes was seated in a pedicure chair. Sat there for another 30 minutes when I was told I would have to wait a few more minutes while she took care of the person who had an appointment 15 minutes after me was taken care of. I walked out and will never return.

name: Julie Cruz
text: Probably the best pedicure ever. I judge all my pedicures on how they handle my ingrown nails and my scarred foot. The gentleman who did my pedicure and a very basic manicure was very knowledgeable. He recognized my problems before I even said anything, he gave great advice on my very dry cuticles and he didn’t rush or try to pretend he got my ingrowns when he didn’t. I wish I lived here, this would be my go-to salon.

name: Joy Moore
text:
Other reviews said quick service.. which is fine but nail polish should not be rushed.  That was the entire experience-rushed.   when they "ordered" me to go dry my nails under the lamp they plopped my purse in my lap and walked away. I had to move the arm of the chair, carry my purse, phone and water bottle to the drying station by myself.  Mind you, I have wet polish on my hands.   Needless to say, I bumped the nail and they had to reapply.

When they painted the fingernails they applied the layers of polish so quick that after one day it started to peel right off the nails.   Never had this experience at any other salon but then again, they rush you through the process.  They want everyone to buy gels so guess they don't care about the customers that want regular polish.   Very disappointed it did not even make it 24 hours before it started to peel right off.

name: NaTasha Sherwin
text: Mani was terrible.  I do a better job at home.

name: Gloria Lucas
text:
I went to Purity Nails yesterday. While I was having my pedicure done, the loud television began to lose signal and make an awful loud, buzzing noise. After a few minutes when I realized that they weren’t planning on correcting the problem, I kindly asked if they would mind changing the channel. I was told that all the channels do that and eventually it would start working again. I then asked if they could turn down the volume in the meantime, to which I was told that “it would be too quiet in here.”

I will NEVER go to this salon again.

name: Michelle Sanders
text: Quick and friendly service.

name: Allison Carnes
text: This is my favorite place to get my nails done. They are always friendly and I am always happy with my nails.

name: Becca Bearden
text: I got a man i don't know his name but he rushed through didn't get all the old polish off. My nails are bumpy. Didn't clean up his lines, i got a simple french. He huffed and puffed when i asked him to so something. Didn't cut my cuticles. And wouldn't stop watching the game not paying attention at all.

name: Sofia Brown
text: I went here 2 weeks ago and the staff was very friendly. I got the gel nails and they came out extremely straight and very beautiful. I leave all of my things in the car that way I know not to carry things around with the wet fingernail polish on. They even had me pay before they painted my nails that way it would be easier. I was looking for a color that was like a dark maroon and when I picked out the Polish I thought it was it was the wrong color. The lady who was painting my nails offered to go pick the color out for me and when she did it came out to be the color I wanted. There are extremely helpful and like I said my nails came out great. I will be coming in later today to get them redone because now I want french tips! To the negative reviews on this place your complaints seem to be your fault. For example it's your fault that you didn't check the expiration date on the gift certificate. And it's your fault that you brought in a water bottle your purse your phone and all other kinds of stuff that you expected them to cater and carry for you when you should have left those items in the vehicle.

name: Steve Edwards
text: The staff is always very friendly and professional.

text: I was going to have a pedicure here but had to walk out. The place smelled of mold and there was visible dust and filth. I don't trust that the tools would be sterilizes properly.

text: Great Job Great Value

text: My wife goes here to get her nails done and has never had a problem.  They are always friendly when I go in to purchase a giftcard.

text: I faithfully visit them every two weeks for my mani and pedi and sometimes eyebrow wax! It's such a great atmosphere! Very reasonable prices and never a long wait. I will definitely recommend this shop to everyone I know!

text: I asked for a full set with burgundy color with gold glitter, and they told me they do not carry glitter. My nails  are  not even,  they are angled too left. When  I voiced my unhappiness, he simply ignored me. I regret coming to this establishment. $49 down the drain.

name: Pfeondra Shamburger
text: I faithfully visit them every two weeks for my mani and pedi and sometimes eyebrow wax! It's such a great atmosphere! Very reasonable prices and never a long wait. I will definitely recommend this shop to everyone I know!

text: This was my first time here, very fast and good service. I love this place

text: Great service and very happy with my solar nails.

name: Heather Rodgers
text: This is a horrible place. My 5 year old daughter received a gift certificate for her birthday and we picked today for my Mother's Day pedicure and to redeem her gc. They get is started and begin on my daughter then come up to me with the gift certificate and a part torn off that shows it is expired. I was very angry because they started on my daughter before their detective work. They said they would do her nails but when she began crying they said they would do both nails and toes. It was not a full pedicure. So, the $27 her gift giver paid went straight to thei pockets. Buyer and customer beware. Their 6 month expiration appears to be a scam to steal people's money. Do not go here. Never. Do not buy gift certificates. Needless to say I walked out of my chair and did not get my Mother's Day pedicure. My daughter had to witness my argument with the owner/manager instead of having a special time with me.

name: Des
text: I am highly disappointed with this location’s front-office service, specifically Debra. I had an appointment this evening at 5pm, but woke up experiencing illness so wanted to reschedule my appointment, especially in light of the Covid-19 climate we are still in. I called their office first thing (8am) and explained my illness to Debra and informed her I would like to reschedule. She gave me several run-arounds concerning why even though I was sick I could not reschedule. Even so much as stating the owners are the reason why if a patron feels ill they still have to be serviced. She then said half of my Massage Envy points banked for today’s service would be expensed because of the same day reschedule. I asked what concessions are made for feverish patrons. She said they are still required to show up and Massage Envy would take their temperature. I told her I would be going to the doctor’s office today and could provide an excuse. She said a manager would get back with me today, but no one ever contacted me. After having my suspicions proven that I had been lied to and no one would contact me, I called back to ask about what was the current status of my appointment/points. I was then informed the appointment was taken off the records and all of my points for today’s session had been expensed. I am extremely frustrated with their “customer care”. I feel lied to and with their “Covid protocols” that were exhibited today first-hand to me, I will NEVER feel comfortable patronizing them again. There is no telling how many patrons who have been ill (with or without fevers) have received service and unintentionally spread it to others with the help of this location’s policies. So much for this place being a standard of wellness services. I feel more stressed now after dealing with this than I did before. I wish I had NEVER booked anything with this location or had my home membership at this location.

name: Stephanie Hazen
text: I absolutely love coming here. As a single mom, I don’t have lots of money to spend on spa services. Because of massage envy I am able to spend a little time pampering myself. Whitney has done an absolute miracle on my face with products and chemical peels. I am so happy! With only one very light peel, about 75% of the dark spots I had from sun exposure are gone. The receptionist is absolutely wonderful. She works really hard to apply coupons and discounts whenever she can. The place has always been clean and welcoming. The staff is great. I did so a massage as well and it was very very relaxing. I got the membership and plan to make monthly visits.

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie, for your positive review of Massage Envy - Hoover. All Massage Envy locations are owned and operated by local franchisees who work hard to ensure guests and members are happy with the services they receive. We are so happy to hear you have had such a great experience.

name: Evyan Gallegos
text: Great communication with staff, felt really safe going in with all the covid-procedures.

resp.text: Reviews like this are important and it is greatly appreciated that you took the time to leave your positive feedback for Massage Envy - Hoover. Thank you, Evyan!

name: Maria
text:
Just had a massage. My experience was a 3/5 stars for the following:

1. There was a fan on me the entire time... For one hour, I was covered in oil (and naked with only a sheet covering me) with a fan on me in the middle of winter! I was almost shivering. The bed warmer was either not on or not working.... Bummer. Also, the light in the room was on the whole time... I like it dark and relaxing. Rooms need to be vacuumed.😞

2. My MT was clearly sick with something respiratory going on. Being that close and breathing over me sick was a major deterrent on a return visit. Not sure if he kept stopping the massage to wipe his nose or what but I've never had so many pauses in a massage. 😷I'm used to smooth continuous pressure/ touch during a massage except for when its time to turn. Also, no hot towels this time!!!😩

3. I feel like this particular chain is on the downhill... The past few times I've gone, you can never get the same therapist twice. It appears there is a lot of turnover here. It is noisy in the hallway out side of the room. I made sure to use all of my gift card so my friends and family can start giving me new gift cards to use somewhere new.😐

4. The receptionist stated she was going to look up my gift card towards the balance. I had two cards to use. She couldn't get them at first. Luckily, I had them on me.

*Overall, not a terrible experience but in Hoover, I have many other options to choose from for a good massage and I'll start seeking out those places next. For someone that splurges to have a massage 3 times/ year at most, my expectations were not met for the cost of services rendered.  Staff was friendly. MT gave a decent massage with good pressure (minus all the pauses).

resp.text: Hello Maria, thank you for letting us know about your experience at Massage Envy - Hoover franchised location. We encourage you to reach out to the franchised location through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW to express your concerns and allow them to help address these issues.

name: Tracy Durrett
text:
Quintette was great and I had a great massage. Debra was very nice and helpful. I also had a facial with Selena. She was late and I was suppose to have an hour and it was only 45 min at best. That included me changing and all. She never discussed products with me other than not to use an abrasive exfoliater on my checks.
She left the headband on and the bed raised up and I slipped getting down since it was still up. I would go back for the massage but would request someone different for a facial.

resp.text: Hello Tracy, on behalf of Massage Envy Franchising thank you for expressing your concerns and bringing this to our attention. Please reach out through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so this can be addressed.

name: J J
text: I got a massage for my husband as a gift for his birthday. The environment was comfortable and serene. As far as his his experience, he said his MT did an excellent job. Maybe let the customer inquire about it first.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a positive rating! We're delighted to hear that your husband had a great experience with our team! We appreciate your providing this information so we can improve upon our services.

name: Angeles Vo
text: I got a mysterious rash on my arms after a massage. I notified the receptionist who put a note in the system. I thought maybe I had a one time bad experience, since the rash seemed to go away, so I went back the following month. I got another rash but this time it spread up and down my arms. My doctor told me it looked like a fungal infection but to be safe she would refer me to a dermatologist. I got a doctors note stating I needed to refrain from massages until the dermatologist could determine what the rash was and if it was safe to go back. I took my doctors note and filled out a membership cancellation form. I noticed my monthly fee was withdrawn after I had submitted the form so I called. I was told my cancellation was denied because I needed a note from the dermatologist. I can’t get a dermatologist note for another month when I have my appointment but even so, why is my doctors note not enough? According to their cancellation policy a note from a doctor stating one cannot be massaged for medical reasons should suffice. The manager didn’t even have the decency to call me! I only found out because I called them. I am out $130 and still have one more month before my contract is up. Not to mention the doctor bills. Do not go here! Find a better place to get a massage.

resp.text: Massage Envy is committed to a safe and therapeutic environment. If you feel you have not experienced this at this franchised location, please reach out to the corporate Guest Relations team at guestrelations@massageenvy.com with the details of your experience for further assistance.

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Not enough space for all the issues. Charter member. Joined 10 years ago. Decided in May 2019 it was in decline and too difficult to book due to incredible staff turnover. Also, the experience had become totally inconsistent. Still fighting them for my legitimate cancellation. When I requested cancellation in May I had TEN unused sessions (because they are so understaffed). Had to burn through those first. Sent in my paperwork and have the email in my SENT emails to prove it. They deny having any knowledge and are still billing me! Totally unprofessional. Avoid at all costs.

resp.text: Hello Cheryl, on behalf of Massage Envy Franchising thank you for expressing your concerns and bringing this to our attention. Please reach out through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so this can be addressed.

text: This place is ridiculous! My girlfriend scheduled a day out for my birthday! She didn’t get the reminder phone call that they supposedly do. Also they would only charge 50% of the initial price for cancellation! We rescheduled and they charged the FULL price! My girlfriend literally wasted all this money on a massage and no one laid a hand on me! They’re very horrible with communication and policy between they’re employees! So much for having my first massage on my birthday!

text: I've read these reviews and frankly I was shocked. I had a great experience! My therapist was not only cordial and professional, she also gave me the best massage I've ever had. I've had no issues with billing, and find the staff curtious and hospitable. My therapist's name was Leigh. I would definitely ask for her. She is great and seems to really know what she's doing. text: I'm surprised to read the negative reviews on here.  I've had great massages with Chance and the customer service staff have always been nice to me. resp.text: Christopher Michael, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: S
text: Wish zero was an option. Had a giftcard and made a 6:00 massage appointment, arrived at 5:45, got checked in by 6:00, waited 20 minutes and met therapist as I was getting ready to leave. She immediately made excuses for being late and blamed it on a computer system and iPad not showing me as being checked in. What she didnt realize was the fact she had been observed coming in at 6:00 with drinks and food, and eating, which was the real reason she was late, and unconcerned. Tried to take the high road, but she was agitated, ranting, cursing about how the rest of the schedule was all of a sudden thrown off. Also said she was sleepy and frustrated. Canceled my appointment because there was no way I could enjoy my massage with that type of unprofessional behavior. I'm still waiting on a call from the manager which I don't expect to receive. On a positive note, the 2 young receptionists were very cordial. I do not recommend this location at all! Sorry my family wasted $$ on a giftcard.

resp.text: Thanks for your honest feedback. We're deeply disappointed to hear that this was the experience you had with us. At your earliest convenience, please message us through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so that we can address the details of your review further.

name: Mckinney Chattman
text: Still feel great weeks later and one of the best massages I've had

resp.text: We're excited to hear this! Thank you, Mckinney! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Stephanie Clayton
text: I have been having an issue for 2 months now with this location.   After the desk staff not being trained well enough to handle the request, or just not wanting to, I have asked repeatedly to speak with the manager to no avail and have been transferred to his voicemail, again to no avail.  He will not call me back and he is never in or so they say.  Massage Envy advertises transferring a credit to another member's account (for a fee).  They have charged the fee and have yet to transfer the credit to my sister's membership at another location out of town. Twice now they have set up a guest account for her in Hoover, even after a detailed phone call on May 9, 2016 with a front desk staff to try and rectify this situation because when my sister asked her location if it had transferred and they let her know they had set up a guest account for a half hour in Hoover.  After no help from the Hoover location I called my sister's location out of town and they walked me through how simple the process is to transfer and they themselves cannot understand why I am having issues.  At that point I decided to ask for the manager and I still cannot get any help.  At what point does this surpass bad customer service and become deceptive business practices or fraud because I have paid for a service that they offer but am not getting it?

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to inform us about this situation. We have provided the transfer of your service, as requested. Again, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.

name: Lena Smile
text: My experience was very good. I enjoyed every moment. My therapist was attentive to my needs and very professional. I've had massages all over the US by licenced therapists from the phenomenal to the absolute worst. Massage envy is not only a good experience but it's a great value!

name: Jeannie Dickerson
text: Bad management. Don't do business here!!  I cancelled my membership back in November 2015 and started getting bank drafts again this month. I didn't freeze my account...I cancelled it!!  I've called twice in the past two weeks with no return phone calls. I went down in person and no manager was there and apparently comes and goes with no set schedule according to the staff. I simply want my account completely cancelled and my money refunded. I don't know if the manager is a coward or a thief. I will NEVER be doing business here again and will never refer anyone here for business. The massages were wonderful but the management stinks.

name: Latoya Cunningham
text: Chris the masseuse was amazing!! This was the best experience I have ever had hands down....I frequent massage parlors often! Sandy the esthetician provided me wi th a 5 star facial!! I didn't want to leave! Great atmosphere!

resp.text: Latoya, we are so happy to read such a great review about Massage Envy - Hoover! You really made our day today.

name: Latoya Cunningham

name: Jenn
text:
Almost impossible to get an appointment here. You must make multiple calls to get someone to answer the phone. There is a voicemail. I have left messages but no one returns the call. When I do get a person to answer they are obviously bothered or confused by my request to make an appointment.
The massage therapists are decent  but I absolutely dread calling to make an appointment. So much so that I don't use my massages like I should or could.
I let them charge my debit card once then found out at my next visit that they automatically added it to my file, without my permission, and can charge it whenever they want to now as evidenced by the receptionist telling me she didn't need my signature she can just charge me whenever I come in. Wow.

resp.text: Jenn, first thank you for taking the time to reach out to us with your review and for your praises about our massage therapists! We take great pride in making sure our therapist are well-trained and customer-service oriented. We are sad to hear that this experience did not carry over with our appointment setting process. We do try to accommodate every member and guest, and at times there can be issues when scheduling appointments. Please know that is not how we like to conduct business and that we are working on making changes to solve these issues. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience to you and if you would like, please call Caleb at (205) 988-6400.

name: LaDonna Tedder
text: This place is terrible!  The main selling point for purchasing a membership was the extended hours they offer for appointments.  Who knew it is completely impossible to get an appointment during the evening and when you are lucky enough to get an appointment, they call a few hours prior to cancel the appointment stating the therapist had resigned.  I would definitely NOT recommend wasting your money here.

name: Brooke Robinson
text: I called in today in reference to a double charge on my bank account for my membership fee. Hannah answered the phone and was very unprofessional and definitely not helpful. Not only was she not able to adequately explain the reason for the double charge, she was refusing to provide any helpful information to help resolve the issue and disconnected our phone call prompting me to call again. I requested the manager and was told he had been out of the office for a week and she had no idea when he would be back. What a joke of an establishment. I requested the Regional Manager name and number, oh but I was advised there was no number for her to provide to file a complaint. Their employees need to be trained or as Hannah explained they do not get paid to offer customer service. I will definitely cancel this membership and tell everyone I know to not patronize this establishment.

resp.text: Brooke, We are very sorry that your bank account was charged twice. There can be issues with the system at times and would like to discuss this with you as soon as you can. Please know that is not how we like to conduct business and that we are working on making changes to solve these issues regarding customer service. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience to you and if you would like, please call Caleb at (205) 988-6400.

I told them I had received a voicemail confirming that the appointment time was, in fact, when I thought it was. They "apologized" by telling me that they have made the same mistake in the past and there was nothing they can do. They have a policy stating that clients must cancel at least 1 day before the massage to avoid wasting the therapist's time and I find it disrespectful and unprofessional that they don't hold themselves to the same standards. They were unapologetic and appeared unconcerned by the mistake. Don't waste your time on the poor customer service at this Massage Envy.

text: This is one of the most unprofessional places I have ever visited. I canceled my membership but not before I had to wait an entire year to do it. I specifically asked for a certain time for my facial and had my massage cancelled the day before and asked to move my facial up to the time that my massage previously was set at and the lady confirmed the time. I came the next day at the time I arranged only to sit for 10mins after the start time and I walked out to inquire what happened and the lady couldn't even find me on the schedule at first and then she said oh no your at another time which was an hour later! I reminded her that I had changed the time of my facial to an earlier time yesterday and she got an attitude and was like no there's only one person that does the facial and she was already booked, well why didn't you tell me that yesterday!! They are a subpar massage place and I will not be recommending them to anyone! Also the massages aren't even good and they make you pay for an hour but only massage you for 45 mins...just a complete rip off!
